name: react-express-starter
description: A starter React+Express setup for new projects

scripts.build: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.check:audit: npm audit --level high && cd server && npm run check:audit && cd ../client && npm run check:audit
scripts.check:outdated: npm outdated || true && cd server && npm run check:outdated && cd ../client && npm run check:outdated
scripts.check:types: cd server && npm run check:types && cd ../client && npm run check:types
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && npm run lint:fix && cd ../client && npm run lint:fix
scripts.sort:package: npx sort-package-json && cd server && npx sort-package-json && cd ../client && npx sort-package-json
scripts.start:dev: concurrently 'cd client && npm run dev' 'cd server && npm run dev'
